ygData.subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Is this list still alive?
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, similar post has been put up in DAOC Vault forum DAOC fans supporters fighting back.  Anyway everyone know FOH is EQ s pet, I won t be surprised if they
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, similar post has been put up in DAOC Vault forum DAOC fans supporters
fighting back. Anyway everyone know FOH is EQ's pet, I won't be surprised
if they can only see the bad stuffs. Check the forum thread in SG-DAOC
forum, I put it up 1-2 days ago :)

Enjoy reading, hehe.

On 25 September, 2001 7:27 PM, Andrew Lam [SMTP:draco@...]
wrote:
> guess what? www.noows.com
>
> FoH hates DAoC heh :)
> Their message board is a very interesting read of what Furor has to say
> about DAoC.
>

and
